p: Our data showed a sharp increase in ZIKAV publications over the last years, particularly from 2015 onwards, both worldwide and in LAC countries, (Fig. 1, left panel). Authors from the USA ( n = 2169), LAC countries ( n = 1086) and China ( n = 365) were the most frequent in the period reviewed (Fig. 1, right panel). Brazil was involved in 67% of all LAC publications ( n = 729), accounting for 13% of the world’s scientific publications on ZIKAV, followed by Colombia ( n = 140), Venezuela (n = 36) and Argentina ( n = 35) (Fig. 1, right panel).
